"Tryggve Nilsson, an upper class snobb who&#039;s only seen
the easy side of life, sits down to enjoy a hot cup of 
coffie when suddenly there&#039;s a knock on his front door.
In comes a stranger with a quite unusual request. As
Tryggve fails to comply, the man becomes more and more
violent and it quickly gets out of hand."

Banned from Swedish short film festival "Frame" due to it&#039;s 
graphic nature, we at Nocturnus Films decided to release the
feature here instead.
